name: Introduction to HTML
description: Create a simple HTML page with your personal information.

name: CSS Project
description: Design a webpage using CSS to style it.

name: UI Mockup
description: Design a mockup for a user interface of an application.

name: Server Deployment
description: Upload a web application to a server using FTP.

name: Development Environment Setup
description: Set up a development environment for a web application.

name: REST API
description: Create a simple REST API using PHP.

name: Final Server Project
description: Develop a project that integrates everything learned in the course.

name: Technical Vocabulary
description: Create a glossary of technical vocabulary in English.

name: Oral Presentation
description: Prepare and deliver a presentation in English on a technical topic.

name: Business Plan
description: Develop a business plan for an entrepreneurial idea.

name: Market Research
description: Conduct market research on a business idea.
